question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/genesis.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_change_set_for_testing()] [Test genesis security] Does the test genesis include security-critical configurations (validator sets, gas parameters), or can missing configs cause simulations to bypass security checks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/genesis.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_change_set_for_mainnet()] [Mainnet genesis tampering] Is the mainnet genesis generation deterministic and tamper-proof, or can modified genesis states be injected into simulations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_state_value()] [State corruption] Can set_state_value() be called with malformed StateValue data that crashes the VM when executed, causing DoS? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_state_value()] [Overwrite protection] Does set_state_value() allow overwriting critical system resources (validator configs, feature flags) without validation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::remove_state_value()] [Deletion protection] Can remove_state_value() delete critical system resources that should be immutable, breaking simulation invariants? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::apply_write_set()] [Write set atomicity] Is apply_write_set() atomic, or can partial application leave the state store in an inconsistent state if errors occur mid-application? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_resource()] [BCS serialization errors] Does set_resource() properly handle BCS serialization errors for malformed resource structs, or can invalid resources be stored? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_resource()] [Type confusion] Can set_resource() be called with mismatched type parameters that create StateKeys for wrong resource types? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::get_resource()] [Deserialization vulnerabilities] Does get_resource() validate BCS-deserialized data against Move type safety rules, or can malformed resources bypass type checks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::get_resource()] [None vs empty resource] Does returning None correctly distinguish between missing resources and empty resources, or can this ambiguity cause logic errors? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::modify_resource()] [TOCTOU vulnerability] Is modify_resource() atomic, or can time-of-check-time-of-use races allow concurrent modifications to corrupt resource state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::modify_resource()] [Missing resource error] Does modify_resource() fail safely when the resource doesn't exist, or can the error message leak sensitive information? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::get_resource_group()] [Resource group deserialization] Can malformed BTreeMap data in resource groups cause deserialization panics or memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_resource_group()] [Resource group size limits] Are there limits on resource group size, or can arbitrarily large groups cause memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::set_on_chain_config()] [Config validation] Does set_on_chain_config() validate config values (e.g., gas parameters, validator set size), or can invalid configs break simulations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::get_on_chain_config()] [Config fetch failure] When fetch_config() returns None, is the error message informative enough to debug missing configs, or can it mask configuration bugs? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::modify_on_chain_config()] [Config modification atomicity] Is modify_on_chain_config() atomic, or can failed modifications leave configs in invalid intermediate states? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::add_module_blob()] [Module blob validation] Does add_module_blob() validate that the blob is a valid compiled Move module, or can arbitrary bytecode be injected? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::add_module()] [Module serialization] Can module.serialize() fail for certain module structures, and does error handling prevent corrupted modules from being stored? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation/src/state_store.rs] [Trait: SimulationStateStore::get_module()] [Deserializer config] Does get_module() use correct DeserializerConfig limits (max_binary_format_version, max_identifier_size), or can oversized modules bypass limits? (High)
